import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import Tech from '../Images/tech.jpeg' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { FaFacebookF, FaGooglePlusG, FaLinkedinIn, } from 'react-icons/fa' import { AiFillEye, AiFillEyeInvisible } from 'react-icons/ai' function Login() { const [data, setData] = useState ('') const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) console.log({data}); const toggle = () =>{ setOpen(!open) } const updateChange = (e) => { const inputs = e.target.value; const name = e.target.name; setData(values => ({...values[name], inputs})) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert('welcom!!') }; return (

Login to Your Account

Login using social networks

OR
{ (open === false)? : }

Remember me

Forgot Password

New Here?

Register and discover a great amount of new opporturnities!

) } export default Login
